channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Magento Commerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Magento Commerce

item.title: CVE-2022-24086|2024-08-03T03:59:23.565Z -- adobe -- magento%20commerce
item.description: Adobe Commerce versions 2.4.3-p1 (and earlier) and 2.3.7-p2 (and earlier) are affected by an improper input validation vulnerability during the checkout process. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction and could result in arbitrary code execution.
